content.raw:
This may be trifling stuff, but I also change element names for the plugin parameter so they are shorter and could be more intuitive.

`flash_lght` => `light`

`light_id` => `id`

[https://bitbucket.org/tidota/gazebo/commits/f983cf28569b3d266af7e754e6b5a51a808056b1?at=flash\_light](https://bitbucket.org/tidota/gazebo/commits/f983cf28569b3d266af7e754e6b5a51a808056b1?at=flash_light)
content.html:
This may be trifling stuff, but I also change element names for the plugin parameter so they are shorter and could be more intuitive.

flash_lght => light

light_id => id

https://bitbucket.org/tidota/gazebo/commits/f983cf28569b3d266af7e754e6b5a51a808056b1?at=flash_light
